website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Flex Appeal 3.0 - Finest Hour received mostly positive reviews. It was lauded for its lightweight and breathable build. It was also commended for relieving foot pains. Though many were pleased with how this footwear fit, the midfoot appeared too tight for people with high insteps. But in the end, because it was very comfortable on the foot, users recommended it to their peers.
pros: A vast majority of reviewers deemed the Skechers Flex Appeal 3.0 - Finest Hour to be comfortable for extended periods of wear
The snug heel and roomy forefoot of the trainer were well received by droves of owners
Many shoppers were delighted that this model was lightweight and breathable
A lot of people with foot issues like plantar fasciitis appreciated the arch support because it relieved pain and discomfort
The product was considered affordable given how durable it was
cons: A few wearers with high insteps stated that the fit was tight at the midfoot and needed to be broken in for a more relaxed fit

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable, right from day 1! The delivery arrived on time and in perfect condition. My feet can't stand flats or sandals and I always wear trainers with cushion heels. After going through a lot of positive reviews about this product, I decided to give it try and I am glad I did!! They are not only light weight but also look trendy for both office and casual wear. This is my first purchase from Sketchers and will buy from them again <3
customer_reviews.author: Manik G.

customer_reviews.title: Another Skechers winner!
customer_reviews.text: Over the last few years I've bought several different pairs of Skechers shoes as they provide outstanding comfort which I struggle to find with other brands. These are my 2nd pair of this Flex Appeal design (the others were black). I have wide feet and it is essential that I have comfortable, practical shoes for dog walking and long periods of standing at work. The other bonus for most Skechers designs is that they are washable on a cool wash. I would definitely recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are just as comfy as all of the other Sketchers I’ve bought. Just put them straight on and have never had any rubbing because they are beautifully finished. No lumpy or raised stitching inside the shoes, and can walk miles on the cushiony soles. I always buy Sketchers now.
customer_reviews.author: Debseealot

customer_reviews.title: Comfort above all else.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, easy to put on, can wear with out socks as they are nicely cushioned inside. Very light weight too. Well worth the money. I have at least 5 pairs of Skechers. They are ALL very comfortable and give me a bit of bounce!
customer_reviews.author: iolanthe

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and look nicer than in the images
customer_reviews.text: Love Skechers memory foam trainers. So comfy and lightweight. I was extremely happy to spot these when less than half RRP. Got them in black. They look way better than the image shown. The main material has silver thread going through it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mishmash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Unusual, to find high-quality, large (8) girl's shoes ..... and at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: James McGrory

customer_reviews.title: Not worth their money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit well and was tight round the match if my foot and looked like it was made of cheap materials. Good thing I used prime wardrobe to try these on
customer_reviews.author: Emily Roberts

customer_reviews.title: new shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but need a little breaking in as tongue section on top of shoe digs in .but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: R.A.M. 2tall

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy great for work just what i need as I'm on my feet 19-12 hours a day
customer_reviews.author: Lhasafan

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and light!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these trainers! So comfy, so light, so stylish and at a great price! What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Super Skechers
customer_reviews.text: This is my sixth pair of skechers and my second pair of flex appeal 3. They are really comfortable and easy to put on. I can walk for miles and they keep my feet cool. Highly recommend these 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B I Swann

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy Well made Lovely colour arrived prompt Well Packed Can recommend
customer_reviews.author: Devon Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Skechers - always make walking easy
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair of Skechers and although they are very comfortable they are both on the large size. Needed to buy an insole to make them fit better.
customer_reviews.author: DianeS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Usually a size 5 but 4.5 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Geegee7

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely shoes nut a bit on the narrow side. I suppose it will stretch in time
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I already have a grey pair and found them very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: FPN

customer_reviews.title: A bit sparkly!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased, they have a bit of sparkle in the grey so don’t look quite as plain as the picture. Fit is as per normal size and lovely and comfortable to wear all day - this is my second pair of this type of Skechers and just as good as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. N. England

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I won’t wear any trainers except Skechers. So comfortable and a good fit for me. I think they come up a little large, but I walk about 10 miles a day, and like to be able to wiggle my toes when I can.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Women’s flex Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit extremely well finished and very happy with the Skechers
customer_reviews.author: Docdee

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's Flex Appeal 3.0-Finest Hour Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: Get right into your workout with sleek style and amazing supportive comfort in the Skechers flex appeal 3.0 - finest hour shoe. Soft mesh fabric and synthetic upper in a slip on sporty walking sneaker with stitching accents and air cooled memory foam insole.
feature_bullets: Air Cooled Memory Foam Cushioned Comfort Insol"
